Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: Graduation
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Jen Jackson, Zeke Nicholson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Allie pursues her education, such as it is and finds her place in the family business. Prince Chauncley tries to live up to his father's expectations, but King Cragnoor sets a very high bar. Edward almost loses his head, quite lit...

Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: Help Wanted
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Lucas Gardner, Jen Jackson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Alexandra is excited when she's offered a job by the town's doctor, but soon realizes she is facing a moral dilemma.

Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: Road Trip
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Anna Drezen, Jen Jackson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: While Prince Chauncley and Lord Vexler are on a diplomatic mission, a new invention threatens Eddie's family business.

Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: Internship
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Georgie Aldaco, Jen Jackson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Prince Chauncley gets an internship. Mikey makes some new friends.

Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: Holiday
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Lucas Gardner, Jen Jackson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: On Harvest Day, extended family discord spirals out of control for the peasants and the royalty.

Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: Music Festival
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Jen Jackson, Zeke Nicholson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Alex begins to fear her friends are leaving her behind, while Prince Chauncley organizes a music concert to try to raise the spirits of the peasants.

Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: Day in Court
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Zeke Nicholson, Jen Jackson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: After the royal goat eats their garden, Alex represents Eddie when he sues the royal family. Vexler files a counter-lawsuit that puts Eddie's life in jeopardy.

Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: First Date
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Jen Jackson, Zeke Nicholson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Prince Chauncley invites Allie to an astronomy lecture to spend more time together, but things take an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Eddie meets a new neighbor and instantly likes her, but his old pals aren't very nice to her.

Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: Moving Out Part 1
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Dan Mirk, Jen Jackson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Alex wants to go with Cosmos to Paris, while Prince Chauncely prepares for his arranged wedding.

Episodes.Title: Dark Ages: Moving Out Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Simon Rich, Dan Mirk, Jen Jackson
Episodes.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Geraldine Viswanathan, Karan Soni
Episodes.Plot: Lower Murkford braces for the Valdrogian invasion.
